buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Here you can find the base buttons component. The .sbtn class is the core button component of the system. It uses CSS custom properties (variables) to allow complete theming and customization. All variants and sizes extend from it. Each modifier class updates the default button through scoped CSS variables — making this system themeable without touching the core styles.

variants.title: Base Button
variants.description: This is the basic class of button component which holds all the properties (variables) for the future customization and Theming.

variants.title: Color Variants
variants.description: These use --clr-* theme variables which you should define in your root theme oroverride in custom themes.

variants.title: Style Variants
variants.description: Buttons support multiple styles: Outline, Link, and Icon-only. You can mix styles — for example, use .sbtn-outline or .sbtn-link with icon buttons for minimal UI.

variants.title: Size Variants
variants.description: Use size variants to control button dimensions. Options include: Small, Default, Large, and Extra Large — each adjusts padding, font size, and height to suit different UI contexts.

variants.title: Custom Classes
variants.description: Customize buttons by adding your own classes and overriding CSS variables. This lets you create new button styles that match your theme without touching the core button structure.
